name: bulma-tile
description: A self organized bulma-tile custom element.

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run esm && npm run min
scripts.cjs: cp index.js cjs/ && echo "module.exports = customElements.get('bulma-tile');" >> cjs/index.js
scripts.esm: cp index.js esm/ && echo "export default customElements.get('bulma-tile');" >> esm/index.js

author: Andrea Giammarchi
